code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WeatherCard=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;const{name,main,weather,wind}=data;const currentDateTime=new Date().toLocaleString();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"weather-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:currentDateTime}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Temperature: ",main.temp,"\xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Weather: ",weather[0].description]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Humidity: ",main.humidity,"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Wind Speed: ",wind.speed," m/s"]})]});};export default WeatherCard;
